content.new:
[for example, offset should not be to velocity target here](#!/osrf/handsim/src/99c499e1298ba888011f5c50a1b2c75f2cf83c6f/src/HaptixControlPlugin.cc?at=default#cl-873)

and similarly, velocity and torque should divide by `multiplier`,

title.new: fix joint gearbox offsets and multiplier in transmissions
